update workflowactionset set actionname = replace(actionname,'action.','')
where instr(actionname,'action.')>0
where CHARINDEX('action.',actionname)>0

update workflowactionset set interfaceid = replace(interfaceid,'action.','')
where instr(interfaceid,'action.')>0
where CHARINDEX('action.',interfaceid)>0

select a.id, a.formid from formactionset a, formactionsqlset b where a.id = b.actionid and a.formid < 0
and instr(b.actiontable, -a.formid) = 0
and charindex(cast(-a.formid as varchar), b.actiontable) = 0
mapper.select: select COUNT(id) from workflowactionset where charindex('action.',actionname)=1 or charindex('action.',interfaceid)=1
select COUNT(id) from workflowactionset where instr(actionname,'action.') = 1 or instr(interfaceid,'action.')=1
select t.* from wsformactionset t where not exists ( select 1 from wsformactionset t1 join wsregiste t2 on t1.wsurl = to_char(t2.id) where t.id=t1.id )
select t.* from wsformactionset t where not exists ( select 1 from wsformactionset t1 join wsregiste t2 on t1.wsurl = convert(varchar(1000),t2.id) where t.id=t1.id )
select t.* from wsformactionset t where not exists ( select 1 from wsformactionset t1 join wsregiste t2 on t1.wsurl = t2.id where t.id=t1.id )
